title: LVMH’s Offer for Tiffany, Brexit’s Impact on Food, Lagarde’s ECB Perils
itunes:title: LVMH’s Offer for Tiffany, Brexit’s Impact on Food, Lagarde’s ECB Perils
description:
Bloomberg News Deals Reporter Ed Hammond and Charlie Bobrinsky, Vice Chairman at Ariel Investments, discuss LVMH’s acquisition offer for Tiffany. Sam Dennigan, CEO of Strong Roots, breaks down the impact of Brexit on the food industry. Andy Browne, Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director, talks about the Trump administration working with China on a trade deal. Bloomberg News European Economy Editor Jana Randow explains the perils Christine Lagarde faces at the ECB. And we Drive to the Close with Ryan Detrick, Senior Market Strategist at LPL Financial.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
